title: Best of The Program | Guests: John Ondrasik, Dale Brisby, & Trey Trainor l 9/16/21
description:
Former FEC Commissioner Trey Trainor joins to discuss Twitter blocking the Hunter Biden laptop story and the FEC clearing the company of election interference. John Ondrasik, famous as Five For Fighting, joins Glenn to discuss his song “Blood on My Hands” and the current situation in Afghanistan. Host of “How to Be a Cowboy” Dale Brisby joins to discuss his Netflix show and what he believes being a cowboy requires.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
